
adapt_intensity_range
=====================



.. py:function:: stimupy.utils.adapt_intensity_range(img, intensity_min=0.0, intensity_max=1.0)


   Adapt intensity range of image

   :param img: stimulus array
   :type img: np.ndarray
   :param intensity_min: new minimal intensity value
   :type intensity_min: float
   :param intensity_max: new maximal intensity value
   :type intensity_max: float

   :returns: **img** -- image with adapted intensity range
   :rtype: np.ndarray
